Package utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassificationClass
    Classification class given to classified documents.
    Document
    Document to be classified or to train the classifier by.
    FileLoader
    Utility class to load data from files.
    FileSaver
    File saver is used to save information into files.
    Model
    Model class is used to simplify loading and saving of trained classifier;
    ModelOperator
    File operator class is an abstract class with attributes containing information about tags in file containing saved model.
